subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova rallied to defeat Eugenie Bouchard, 4-6, 7-5, 6-2, and Simona Halep beat Andrea Petkovic, 6-2, 7-6 (4), on Thursday to advance to Saturday’s final.
snippet: Maria Sharapova rallied to defeat Eugenie Bouchard, 4-6, 7-5, 6-2, and Simona Halep beat Andrea Petkovic, 6-2, 7-6 (4), on Thursday to advance to Saturday’s final.
